name: Lost in the Forest (itch) (WastedHyena)
description:
A short text based adventure, with different possible endings and paths. Set place in a dark forest, with a man who has no memory of how he got there. Find your way out if you can.

I've made a few games in the past but none have ever reached the finish line, so I set my goals a bit lower and have finally finished a game, albeit a short one. I am actually planning on making it longer now that I know I have the ability to.
